ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition ideas (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Give me a noncombatant role any day of the week. I think overall as a class - MOST bards - at least those well suited to the role have matured past having to
ygData.messageBody:
Give me a noncombatant role any day of the week.

I think overall as a class - MOST bards - at least those well suited to the
role have matured past having to be the center of attention and HERO of the
day.



At 05:04 PM 8/7/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Sean Gifford" <Giffords@...>
>
>Would you rather be a poor little pansy strumming his/her lute on the street
>corner of some slum, or being a Blade swinging cuisiniart slaying big ugly
>orcs and whatnot???
>
>Gleeman, Half Elven Bard of the 15th Chorus
>EQ is a drug, and I need a fix
